ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: LD50; Species: /Anas platyrhynchos/ (Mallard duck) 6 month old males and females; oral 2.27 mg/kg (95% confidence limit: 1.26-4.11 mg/kg) /98% Strychnine alkaloid, NF/
LD50; Species: /Phasianus colchicus/ (Pheasant) 12-24 month old males in breeding condition; oral 24.7 mg/kg (95% confidence limit: 14.4-42.2 mg/kg) /98% Strychnine alkaloid, NF/

LD50; Species: /Phasianus colchicus/ (Pheasant) 2 month old males; oral (admin into esophagus by ball-tipped intubation needles) 8.48 mg/kg (95% confidence limit: 4.41-16.3 mg/kg) /Strychnine sulfate, USP/
LD50; Species: Chukar, 5-7 month old females and males; oral 16.0 mg/kg (95% confidence limit: 8.0-32.0 mg/kg) /98% Strychnine alkaloid, NF/
LD50; Species: /Coturnix japonica/ (Japanese quail) 2 month old females some of which were laying eggs; oral 22.6 mg/kg (95% confidence limit: 11.9-42.9 mg/kg) /98% Strychnine alkaloid, NF/
LD50; Species: /Columba livia/ (Rock dove) males and females; oral 21.3 mg/kg (95% confidence limit: 16.9-26.9 mg/kg) /98% Strychnine alkaloid, NF/
LD50; Species: /Zenaida macroura/ (Mourning dove) females and males; oral (admin into esophagus with ball-tipped intubation needles) >5.12 mg/kg /Strychnine sulfate, USP/
LD50; Species: /Passer domesticus/ (House sparrow) males; oral 4.18 mg/kg (95% confidence limit: 3.18-5.50 mg/kg) /98% Strychnine alkaloid, NF/
LD50; Species: /Aquila chrysaetos/ (Golden eagle) oral 5.0-10.0 mg/kg /Strychnine sulfate, USP/
LD50; Species: Mule deer, 8-11 month old females; oral 17.0-24.0 mg/kg /98% Strychnine alkaloid, NF/
LD50; Species: Bullfrog, males; oral 2.21 mg/kg (95% confidence limit: 1.56-3.12 mg/kg) /98% Strychnine alkaloid, NF/
LC50; Species: Lepomis macrochirus (bluegill sunfish); Conditions: freshwater, static bioassay, 23 °C, mild aeration after 24 hr; Concentration: 0.87 ppm for 96 hr
LC50; Species: Menidia beryllina; Conditions: saltwarer, static bioassay, 23 °C, mild aeration after 24 hr; Concentration: 0.95 ppm for 96 hr
LD50; Species: /Anas platyrhynchos/ (Mallard duckling) age 36 hr; oral 2.62 mg/kg (95% confidence limit 1.94-3.55 mg/kg) /98% Strychnine alkaloid, NF/
LD50; Species: /Anas platyrhynchos/ (Mallard duckling) oral 2.00 mg/kg (95% confidence limit 1.51-2.65 mg/kg) /98% Strychnine alkaloid, NF/
LD50; Species: /Anas platyrhynchos/ (Mallard) 1 month old; oral 5.88 mg/kg (95% confidence limit 3.23-10.7 mg/kg) /98% Strychnine alkaloid, NF/
